ai-patthana15.35:0.2_0: The Origin of the Dhamma: allows uninterruptedly in the case of the phenomena, in the various forms -
ai-patthana15.35:0.3_0: Transmigration over the skillful, and so on.
ai-patthana15.35:1.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood and skillful things don’t give rise to the defilement.
ai-patthana15.35:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.35:3.1_0: They don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana15.35:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.35:4.1_0: (They are) associated with pollutants, associated with men and gods.
